document.full_text: the pond, once a soupy stew of algae and duck droppings that caused at least one of the champions to become sick after wading into it, has undergone a face lift in the past decade.
document.title: at women's masters, plunge in poppie's pond is victory lap
lines_and_colors: the pond, once a soupy stew of algae and duck droppings that caused at least one of the champions to become sick after wading into it, has undergone a face lift in the past decade.
